Elita/Kup:

Elita started to cry in silence while Kup Hugged her tightly.

=

From: Sandy 
Sent: Sunday, March 14, 2010 9:05 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.c=
om 
Subject: Re: Back to the Ark


  
Tucson's heart nearly breaks when he =
hears the sadness in Elita's voice. He wished he had better news for her. H=
e turns to Lord Elder and Kup with the same soft expression on his face.

"=
I - wish it didn't have to - come to this. Poor Elita. No one - should ever=
 lose loved ones to - the greed of corrupted forces. Before I - get my ener=
gon, I - think someone needs - a shoulder to lean on."

Still putting other=
s before himself, Tucson slowly walks over to Elita and gently kneels down =
to her, hearing where she is with his supurb hearing. 

" I want you to kno=
w that I fully intend to keep my promise to you. It may take a long time, b=
ut Elita, if I have to lose my spark to give you back your parents, I'll do=
 that. I won't give up until you're reunited with your family. Right now, R=
odimus isn't himself, and I suspect your mother will not be herself either.=
 Perceptor - has altered your father's programming to the point where he co=
nsiders us enemies. Right now, Rodimus would like nothing more than to make=
 scrap metal out of all of us. So - before I can get him to you I - have to=
 find a way to reverse the shell program Perceptor put over him. And that I=
 assure you, is the truth."

He gently takes her hand.

" Until your father=
 and your mother returns, I want you to know that if you need someone to su=
pport you, I'll be more than happy to be that figure. I've got plenty of ro=
om in my heart to care for anyone who needs my help."

He gets back on his =
feet, and gently rubs Elita's shoulder. He stumbles back up and heads over =
to Kup and Lord Elder.

" Next time we encounter Cyclonus, Hydras and Scour=
ge, I personally want to deal wtih Cyclonus myself. He leached off of Rodim=
us and thus has voilated one of our own. He won't get away with it, I won't=
 let him get away with it!"

He now paces with a slight pitch of anger.

" =
And as far as Hydras, Perceptor and Scourge are concerned, I want them lure=
d out into the open and I want full stasis locks on all of them. After that=
, I want them restrained permanently and sent to Char where they can do no =
further harm. After that, I strongly suggest we take over the dark fortress=
, clean it out, and convert it into shelter which can be used to shelter th=
ose who have nothing over their heads. It's the least I can do, to - return=
 something to the innocent which - has been taken away from them". 

He sig=
hs.

" Just be sure no one is killed in the process. I fully intend to do t=
his the honorable way." 

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, <airly2002@...> wr=
ote:
>
> Kup/Elita:
> 
> "Uncle KUp???"said a little voice while Kup Helped=
 Tucson move "is he Tucson? do he have news about my dad and mom?"es
> 
> "=
Yes, little one"said with sad nesKup "When he recovers he can tell us more =
about your Mom and Dad"
> 
> 
> the little sable cat, meowed sadenned and s=
he walked slowly, she hoped that her parets would came back this time... 
>=
 
> 
> From: Preston Carroll 
> Sent: Sunday, March 14, 2010 12:33 PM
> To:=
 nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
> Subject: Re: Back to the Ark
> 
> 
> 
> > He put=
s a hand on Lord Elder's Shoulder.
> >
> > " That goes for you too, Lord El=
der."
> >
> > He then turns to Kup.
> >
> > " Yes Kup, I'd really like to k=
now how this all happened. Only then can I get a better understanding as to=
 why Rodimus was unable to resist the enemy."
> 
> "Thanks Tuscon" Elder sa=
id as he smiled at him. There was something
> about the young Autobot that =
made him more reassured. He didn't know
> if Tuscon really was a Prime, but=
 he certainly seemed more than just
> average soldier.
> 
> > He turns his =
attention back to Lord Elder.
> >
> > " I wish I didn't have to wait so lon=
g for Optimus to re awaken. But a voice just gave me the advice I've been m=
eaning to hear for a long time. Ughhh.... Uh ohh, energy's down again. I - =
think I need a recharge.
> >
> > He stumbles while getting to his feet.
> 
=
> Lord Elder reached out to catch Tuscon as he stumbled. "You certainly
> p=
ush yourself like Prime used to. I have seen the historical
> documentation=
 of some of the old Primes."
> 
> > Kup nodded and said "sit down my friend=
 this is a large tale "
> 
> "Let's get you a flow of energon *first*" Elde=
r said as he helped
> Tuscon to his feet, "and *then* you can listen to Kup=
" Elder said as
> he glanced at Kup. "After all, we don't want to push you =
too hard."
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston
